title: President Obama to Travel to Michigan, Missouri in July | whitehouse.gov
content:
The White House




June 23, 2009

 



President Obama to Travel to Michigan, Missouri in July




THE WHITE HOUSE   Office of Press Secretary  _______________________________________________________________  FOR IMMEDIATE RELEASE                                     June 23, 2009  President Obama to Travel to Michigan, Missouri in July    WASHINGTON – On Tuesday, July 14, 2009, President Barack Obama will travel to Michigan and Missouri.   President Obama will hold a town hall meeting in the Detroit area in Michigan. He will then travel to St. Louis, Missouri, where he will throw out the first pitch at the Major League Baseball All-Star Game.   Major League Baseball is focused on community service during All-Star Week and throughout the summer in conjunction with the President's call to service through United We Serve www.serve.gov.   More details will be released about both events when they become available.
